amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to construction of Native American schools.

vote.text: Amendment SA 793 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 793 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Franken. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text: CR 3/26/2015 S2019) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to construction of Native American schools.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 793 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 793 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Franken.
